author: Nicholas Michel
description: “Inspired by the Original Daiquiri, I wanted to create a cocktail that retained the roots of BACARDÍ Carta Blanca. A touch of history and a dash of nobility combined with an oriental touch. The idea is to keep the exoticism of the liquid that Don Facundo bottled 150 years ago and just add a hint of originality.”
name: Golden Prestige
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
